name: The Missing Cheese
description:
Game Type: 3D Platformer

 Story: Beyron the Wizard has found himself in a little bit of trouble! His magical abilities led up to the creation of an assortment of Enchanted Cheese. His pet mouse, Frederick, is given the task to search for this mystic cheddar, and will surely be rewarded handsomely for such a gratifying quest. With his master’s sorcery, and your help, he will undoubtedly succeed in what is probably his biggest dream: the hunt for cheese! 

Movement Tutorial: Use W, A, S, D in order to move around Use the MOUSE to look around Press SPACE in order to jump around Click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to interact with doors and other objects 

Quest Tutorial: There are three pieces of cheese in total. Look for the magical runes; they look like stones with a blue light sign carved into them. They show that a piece of Magical Cheese is nearby. Prepare for a little bit of jumping.
